text: 2|214|alla, ninnalute mump kalinnupeayavar (visvasikal) kkuntayatu pealulla anubhavannal ninnalkkum vannettate ninnalkk svargattil pravesikkanakumenn ninnal dhariccirikkayanea ? prayasannalum duritannalum avare badhikkukayuntayi. allahuvinre sahayam eppealayirikkum enn avarile daivadutanum addehatteateappam visvasiccavarum parannupeakumar avar virappikkappetukayum ceytu. ennal allahuvinre sahayam atuttu tanneyuntâ€Œ
